cards.title: Laggard
powers: {Laggard} deals 1 target 1 irreducible damage. Increase this damage by 1 for each Hindsight card in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: Reveal and replace the top card of any deck.
Place 1 card from any player's hand on top of their deck.
Play the top card of any deck.

openingLines.default: I'm here now - let's get this done!

flavorQuotes.text: It's too late to stop it, but it's not too late to start fixing things.

cards.title: Escape Route
body: Play this card next to a Hero.
Reduce damage dealt to that Hero by 2.
At the start of your turn, that Hero draws 2 cards. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't think the cliffside route's ever had this many people on it, but it's a little late for second thoughts!

cards.title: Foregone Conclusion
body: After you use a power, you may draw a card.
powers: Reveal the top card of the villain deck. Either return it to the top of the villain deck or play it.

flavorQuotes.text: If we hurry, we can... Oh. They're already getting away.

cards.title: Late to the Party
body: Draw 4 cards.
Play up to 3 Hindsight cards.
Immediately end your turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Eh, don't worry about him - I'm sure he'll catch up.

cards.title: Postseen
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero target.
If that target leaves play, use a power and return this card to your hand.
After that target deals damage to a Hero, that Hero may use a power.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I saw them setting up the ambush, so we can ambush the ambush before they ambush us!

cards.title: SeekVisions
body: Play this card next to a character.
At the start of your turn, put a card from that character's trash on top of that character's deck. Then, you may play the top card of that character's deck. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I saw them setting up the ambush, so we can ambush the ambush before they ambush us!

cards.title: Again?
body: Draw 2 cards.
You may play a Hindsight card from your trash.

flavorQuotes.text: When I started this, I didn't realize how much heroics involved jumping off of cliffs.

cards.title: At Least we're Warned
body: Play this card next to another Hero.
At the start of your turn, that hero may play a card and use a power. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: No, that one's the one where the guards with flamethowers went... Oh, right. You should be fine.

cards.title: Glimpse of the Unknown
body: When this card is destroyed, you may use a power.
powers: Destroy 1 ongoing or environment card. Destroy 1 hero non-character card.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm just glad he confirmed it was a survivable before the drinks really hit.

cards.title: Direct Method
body: Laggard deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
Laggard may deal himself 2 psychic damage. If damage is dealt this way, Laggard deals 1 target 5 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I've known you were causing trouble for months. Why wouldn't I keep something around for dealing with you?

cards.title: Slow Chase Sequence
body: Laggard deals 1 target 3 melee damage.. If a non-indestructible, non-Character target dealt damage this way is in play, place it on top of its deck.

flavorQuotes.text: The others should be here by the time you're back to normal.

cards.title: Fashionably Late
body: At the end of your turn, you may draw 1 card or use 1 power.

flavorQuotes.text: Look, I was still around to help wrap things up. That counts.

cards.title: Chronicle of Unknown Visions
body: When this card enters play, draw 2 cards.
powers: Reveal the top card of any deck. Put that card on the top or bottom of its deck.

flavorQuotes.text: I try to archive the scenes I don't recognize. They tend to come up later.

cards.title: Lost and Found
body: Play this card next to a target.
If that target leaves play, use a power and return this card to your hand.
At the start of your turn, Laggard deals that target 6 projectile damage. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: They're down this alley! Wait, scratch that, that alley!

cards.title: Stall Tactics
body: Play this card next to a target. If that target leaves play, destroy this card.
Reduce damage dealt to and by that target by 1.
At the start of your turn, discard up to 2 cards. If you did not discard 2 cards this way, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't need to stop them. Just slow them for long enough that it won't matter.

promoCardsUnderDev.title: Laggard - Under Development
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: There are few things as satisfying as {br}getting to line up the perfect shot.
